item.title: a sprinkling of understanding Workflow in ILM 2
item.description: Very nice David, I would also urge readers to chec… Brad Turner - Sep 3, 2008 Very nice David, I would also urge readers to check out Mark Gabarra’s blog for information relating WF and ILM 2. I also hope that we’ll be able to goad our own Paul Divan into bringing his experiences to the blogosphere!

item.title: a sprinkling of understanding Workflow in ILM 2
item.description: So by now all of you know that understanding Windows Workflow Foundation is going to be quite helpful in implementing ILM 2. Having lived 9 of the last 12 months in Redmond, WA, I now understand a lot more about sprinkling So I thought I would provide a sprinkling of understanding about Windows Workflow Foundation: a categorization of the built in workflows. Category Activity Composite Notes Invoke Web Service Conditional
